original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.50. Sanidassanattika, Hetuhetusampayuttaduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika hetu hetu sampayutta duka  anidassana appaṭigham hetuñca iva hetu sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā🔽tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā🔽tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā 🔽tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi 🔽anidassana appaṭigham hetu sampayuttam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ 🔽na hetu vippayuttaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā 🔽tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
